files.description: This file contains the setup configuration for packaging the application using setuptools. It specifies package metadata including name, version, packages, install requirements, and console script entry points.
This file lists the dependencies required for the application, such as pytest.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. This file provides two functions: one to search for a word in the Quran verses and another to search for a word group (exact phrase). It iterates over the provided Quran data to return verses that match the search criteria in a case-sensitive manner.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a word in the provided Quran data. Iterates over a list of Quran verses and returns those verses containing the specified search word. The function uses a case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Searches for a specific word group (exact phrase) in the provided Quran data. Iterates through the verses and returns those that contain the given phrase while preserving word order and ensuring case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The exact phrase to search for in the verse text.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. Loads Quran text from a file, performs a search for the word 'اللَّهِ', and prints the search results to the console.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function that orchestrates loading Quran data, searching for the word 'اللَّهِ', and printing the search results. Acts as the primary entry point for the application.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.
Test file for verifying the functionalities of the Quran search module. Contains unit tests that check the correct behavior of word and phrase search functions using sample Quran data.

classes.name: TestQuranSearch
classes.description: Unit test class for testing the Quran search module. It verifies that the search functions return expected results for given search criteria including both existing and non-existing words/phrases.

methods.name: test_search_allah_word
methods.description: Tests that searching for the word 'اللَّهِ' returns at least one verse from the Quran data, ensuring that the search function correctly identifies matching verses.

methods.name: test_search_word_group
methods.description: Tests the search_word_group function with two scenarios: one where an existing word group is present in the Quran data and one where a non-existing group is searched, verifying both correct match and no-match outcomes.

files.description: Data file containing Quran text in Uthmani script. Each line is formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.
